list.abs: 抑郁发作(Depressive Episode)是以心境低落为主的心境障碍。病程标准至少持续2周。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (denoting a section between two choric songs in Greek tragedy): from Greek epeisodion, neuter of epeisodios 'coming in besides', from epi 'in addition' + eisodos 'entry' (from eis 'into' + hodos 'way')

entry.def: You can refer to an event or a short period of time as an episode if you want to suggest that it is important or unusual, or has some particular quality.

example.ex: This episode is bound to be a deep embarrassment for Washington...
example.tran: 这一事件肯定会让华盛顿非常难堪。

example.ex: Unfortunately it was a rather sordid episode of my life.
example.tran: 不幸的是，这是我人生中非常不光彩的一段经历。

entry.tran: （广播剧或电视剧的）一集;（杂志连载故事的）一节
entry.def: An episode of something such as a series on radio or television or a story in a magazine is one of the separate parts in which it is broadcast or published.

example.ex: The final episode will be shown next Sunday.
example.tran: 下周日将播出最后一集。

entry.def: An episode of an illness is short period in which a person who suffers from it is affected by it particularly badly.

example.ex: ...people who'd suffered a third episode of depression in two years...
example.tran: 两年内忧郁症3次发作的人

example.ex: The new drug lessens the severity of pneumonia episodes.
example.tran: 新药减轻了肺炎发作时的痛苦。

means.word_mean: 1. a happening that is distinctive in a series of related events
2. a brief section of a literary or dramatic work that forms part of a connected series
3. a part of a broadcast serial
4. film consisting of a succession of related shots that develop a given subject in a movie

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"在……上,在……周围,在……后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……周围+dem人民+ic……的→在人民周围→流行的
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+derm皮+al……的→在皮上面→表皮的
epidemiology[n.流行病学]+ist专家或人→epidemiologist[研究]传染病的学者
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+gram写→写在上面的话→格言
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+graph写,刻→刻上的话→碑文
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+logu说+e→在后面说的话→后记
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+s+od路+e→在路上→一段经历;片段
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+taph墓→墓上的[字]→墓志铭

stems_affixes.value_cn: [贬低人的]短语或形容词,绰号
stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+thet放→放在名字上的另一个名字→侮辱性的称呼
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+tome卷册→[一卷书后的]梗概

Sentence.sentence: I especially like the episode called "The Printer's Devil.
I really like these old episodes of "The Twilight Zone" because the stories are fascinating.

jushi.english: One of the most impressive episodes in the book occurs in Chapter 7.
jushi.chinese: 书中最感人的部分是在第七章。

jushi.english: That's an episode in my life I won't forget forever.
jushi.chinese: 那是我一生中永远不会忘记的经历。

jushi.english: In the final episode we will find out who did the murder.
jushi.chinese: 在连续剧的最后一集,我们就会发现谁是那宗谋杀案的凶手。
